title: Has anyone got any help with not getting your teammates angry over nothing?
body: Lately i have been in Some games and i have called bot support and half way through game one of the top laners come to bot and the other top starts swearing at me and threatening to report  me if i don't go top and when i go to top he swears at me for getting a kill. any help?

replies.body: Report them for abuse post-game and make use of the mute feature (while in-game: hold tab, click the little speaker next to them).
Thanks! but how do u report people?
In the post game there is a red exclamation mark next to their name. Alternatively you can click the support button on the top right of the lol website and submit a ticket.
It's much more rewarding to make them mad. Rather than to try to calm them down.
